author: David Brennan
title: China Says Sudden Jump in Wuhan Coronavirus Death Toll Is Due to Statistical Verification, Not Cover Up
description: Foreign Ministry spokesperson Zhao Lijian said Friday that the regime in Beijing does not allow cover ups.
content:
A senior Chinese official has defended a sudden increase in the coronavirus death toll in the central city of Wuhan, putting the spike down to standard statistical analysis and once again denying any suggestion of a cover-up.
In his daily briefing, Foreign M… [+5765 chars]
